sermons.sermon_title: "I Have Much People In This City" Acts 18:1-11

occurrences.context: ...ed to do. Now if they don't listen, that's on them. If you fail to warn, the blood's on your hands. Ezekiel 3 and 33, you can look at both passages and you can see that God deals with that.
